message: I agree with your opinion on Clinton, but not with Trump. Trump will wage war and also get the rich richer. It doesn't matter anyway, because our rights will be taken away and we won't have much to live for soon. I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.

ONE PERSON! A whole classroom of people and only ONE tried to stop him! The people in this country need to stop being victims. I keep picturing those Iraqi solders being marched out by ISIS to be beheaded. If you know you're gonna die FIGHT BACK WITH EVERY FIBER OF YOUR BEING!! As an US Army soldier (12 bravo) and a US Marine (0811) I tip my hat to the ONE gentleman who fought back. GOD BLESS YOU, speedy recovery!
